summary: Completed comprehensive codebase refactoring and cleanup. Organized components into feature folders, removed unused hooks (useCart, useFavorites, useProducts, useCarpetManifest) and contexts (LanguageContext), fixed all imports, removed unused components, updated documentation. Build verified successful. Asset audit completed - all product images in /public/Images/Halylar/ are referenced in products.ts and should be kept. No behavior changes - website works exactly the same.
current_status: Codebase refactoring complete. Clean, organized structure with feature-based component folders. All unused code removed. Build succeeds. Documentation updated. Ready for continued development.
